revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Union Cave |image = [[File:Union Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Union Cave. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City and the [[Ruins of Alph]], on Route 32. }} '''Union Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in an 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 14 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 63,600 |- | Wooper (Boss) || 260,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Ratatta * Sandshrew * Zubat * Geodude * Onix * Goldeen * Magikarp * Wooper (Boss)
===Items===
The following items can be obtained from opening chests in this dungeon.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 25% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 25% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
